mapper.insert:
insert into quality_check (
CheckCategory,
CheckListCode,
CheckedCompanyName,
CheckedCompanyCode,
`Group`,
CheckedPersonID,
CheckedPersonName,
GroupLeaderID,
GroupLeaderName,
ResponsiCompanyName,
ResponsiCompanyCode,
ResponsePersonID,
ResponsePersonName,
CheckDate,
CheckPersonID,
CheckPerson,
CheckBasis,
Contractor,
Owner,
ProjectName,
ProjectLeaderID,
ProjectLeaderName,
CheckProject,
ExecStd,
IsPush,
CheckListName,
Issued,
CheckMethod,
QualityCheckName,
WorkerNumber,
ERPNumber,
ExternalNumber,
WorkPlace,
ContractorNumber,
Progress,
FinishDate,
CheckEndDate
) values (
#{checkCategory},
#{checkListCode},
#{checkedCompanyName},
#{checkedCompanyCode},
#{group},
#{checkedPersonID},
#{checkedPersonName},
#{groupLeaderID},
#{groupLeaderName},
#{responsiCompanyName},
#{responsiCompanyCode},
#{responsePersonID},
#{responsePersonName},
#{checkDate},
#{checkPersonID},
#{checkPerson},
#{checkBasis},
#{contractor},
#{owner},
#{projectName},
#{projectLeaderID},
#{projectLeaderName},
#{checkProject},
#{execStd},
#{isPush},
#{checkListName},
#{issued},
#{checkMethod},
#{qualityCheckName},
#{workerNumber},
#{ERPNumber},
#{externalNumber},
#{workPlace},
#{contractorNumber},
#{progress},
#{finishDate},
#{checkEndDate}
)
mapper.update:
update quality_check
CheckCategory=#{checkCategory},
checkListCode=#{checkListCode},
checkedCompanyName=#{checkedCompanyName},
checkedCompanyCode=#{checkedCompanyCode},
`group`=#{group},
checkedPersonID=#{checkedPersonID},
checkedPersonName=#{checkedPersonName},
groupLeaderID=#{groupLeaderID},
groupLeaderName=#{groupLeaderName},
responsiCompanyName=#{responsiCompanyName},
responsiCompanyCode=#{responsiCompanyCode},
responsePersonID=#{responsePersonID},
responsePersonName=#{responsePersonName},
checkDate=#{checkDate},
checkPersonID=#{checkPersonID},
checkPerson=#{checkPerson},
checkBasis=#{checkBasis},
contractor=#{contractor},
owner=#{owner},
projectName=#{projectName},
projectLeaderID=#{projectLeaderID},
projectLeaderName=#{projectLeaderName},
checkProject=#{checkProject},
execStd=#{execStd},
isPush=#{isPush},
checkListName=#{checkListName},
issued=#{issued},
checkMethod=#{checkMethod},
qualityCheckName=#{qualityCheckName},
workerNumber=#{workerNumber},
ERPNumber=#{ERPNumber},
externalNumber=#{externalNumber},
workPlace=#{workPlace},
contractorNumber=#{contractorNumber},
progress=#{progress},
finishDate=#{finishDate}
where Qulity_CheckID=#{qualityCheckID}
mapper.select: select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where CheckedCompanyCode=#{0} and CheckDate >= #{1} and CheckEndDate <= #{2}

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where CheckDate >= #{0} and CheckEndDate <= #{1}

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where CheckedCompanyCode=#{0}

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where CheckedCompanyCode=#{0} and CheckDate >= #{1} and CheckEndDate <= #{2} and IsPush='已推送' and Issued='未下达'

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where CheckedCompanyCode=#{0} and CheckDate >=#{1} and CheckEndDate <=#{2} and IsPush='已推送' and Issued='已下达'

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where CheckedCompanyCode=#{0} and CheckDate >=#{1} and CheckEndDate <=#{2} and IsPush='已推送' and Issued='已整改'

select Qulity_CheckID as qualityCheckID, CheckCategory as checkCategory, CheckedCompanyName as checkedCompanyName, CheckedCompanyCode as checkedCompanyCode, `Group` as `group`, CheckedPersonID as checkedPersonID, CheckedPersonName as checkedPersonName, GroupLeaderID as groupLeaderID, GroupLeaderName as groupLeaderName, ResponsiCompanyName as responsiCompanyName, ResponsiCompanyCode as responsiCompanyCode, ResponsePersonID as responsePersonID, ResponsePersonName as responsePersonName, CheckDate as checkDate, CheckPersonID as checkPersonID, CheckPerson as checkPerson, CheckBasis as checkBasis, Contractor as contractor, Owner as owner, ProjectName as projectName, ProjectLeaderID as projectLeaderID, ProjectLeaderName as projectLeaderName, CheckProject as checkProject, ExecStd as execStd, IsPush as isPush, Issued as issued, CheckListCode as checkListCode, CheckListName as checkListName, CheckMethod as checkMethod, QualityCheckName as qualityCheckName, WorkerNumber as workerNumber, ERPNumber as ERPNumber, ExternalNumber as externalNumber, ContractorNumber as contractorNumber, Progress as progress, FinishDate as finishDate, WorkPlace as workPlace, CheckEndDate as checkEndDate from quality_check where IsPush='通过'
